text:
{t:A Man You Don't Meet Every Day}
{st:Traditional}
{key: G}
{keywords: Solo, Mandolin, Ukulele}

Intro:
[G]   [D]   [G]   [C]
[G]   [D]   [G]   [D]

Verse 1:
Oh my [G]name is Ke'in [D]Pauli I'm a [G]canny axe [C]man
And a [G]roving young [D]fellow I've been[G]      [D]
So be [G]easy and [D]free when you're [G]drinking with [C]me
I'm a [G]man you don't [D]meet every [G]day   [D]

Verse 2:
I have [G]acres of land[D] I have [G]men at comm[C]and
I have [G]always a shill[D]ing to spare [G]        [D]
So be [G]easy and [D]free when you're [G]drinking with [C]me
I'm a [G]man you don't [D]meet every [G]day

Chorus:
So come [G]fill up your [D]glasses with [G]whiskey and [C]wine
What[G]ever it [D]costs, I will pay[G]         [D]
So be [G]easy and [D]free when you're [G]drinking with [C]me
I'm a [G]man you don't [D]meet every [G]day

Solo:
[G]   [D]   [G]   [C]
[G]   [D]   [G]   [D]
[G]   [D]   [G]   [C]
[G]   [D]   [G]   [G]

Chorus:
So come [G]fill up your [D]glasses with [G]whiskey and [C]wine
What[G]ever it [D]costs, I will pay[G]         [D]
So be [G]easy and [D]free when you're [G]drinking with [C]me
I'm a [G]man you don't [D]meet every [G]day

Verse 3:
Well I [G]took out my [D]dog and [G]him I did [C]shoot
All [G]down in the [D]county Kildare[G]       [D]
So be [G]easy and [D]free when you're [G]drinking with [C]me
I'm a [G]man you don't [D]meet every [G]day

Chorus:
So come [G]fill up your [D]glasses with [G]whiskey and [C]wine
What[G]ever it [D]costs, I will pay[G]         [D]
So be [G]easy and [D]free when you're [G]drinking with [C]me
I'm a [G]man you don't [D]meet every [G]day

Outro:
(slow)
So be [G]easy and [D]free when you're [G]drinking with [C]me
I'm a [G]man you don't [D]meet every [G]day
